content: 200 USD(BTC) Tournament - Wednesday (8th Nov) 14:00 UTCTournament link : https://blackjack.fun/tournament/9LZr1dELPrize: 200 USD(BTC) (No wager requrements to withdraw)Accepted Forum Rank: Sr - Legendary (Some others has invited via email)Feedback and discussion regarding the tournament are appreciated. in Blackjack.fun ann thread.Please comment below "I am in with your Blackjack.fun username" if you are interested in joining.  or pm me for the password and invite your bitcointalk friends.

comments.author: mv1986
comments.body: I assume that this offer is a fake. It doesn't work and although everybody complains that playing is not possible, the admins are pretty rude:I have also observed something pretty weird. When I signed up and used that website, some unknown installer launched on my screen. I shut it down via the system options. I am not sure if this is just to get more people to sign up in order to... I don't know. Take care, and keep in mind these tournaments don't work.
